ProjectTitle: Temporal trends and drivers of antibiotic failure in the general population
InitialFeedbackHistory:
04/07/2023
Please describe your 3rd party agreements with CPRD, how long are you allowed to keep the data? according to their website this is normally 12 months, in that case the RDM policy asks you to preserve your own (processed) data for the 10 years, but not the data from others that you are not allowed to keep 
Note that KU Leuven RDR is primary meant for data sharing, not for only data preservation, but data can be kept in RDR under restricted access if needed, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr or consult the storage guide to find a solution just for preservation: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
